description: Mayors are urged to honour, in streets and squares, African soldiers who fought for France .
title: France to rename streets after African WW2 heroes
title_page: France to rename streets after African WW2 heroes - BBC News
maintext: "Like it or not, their forefathers took part in the liberation of France. The history of our country and history of Africa are linked and it is urgent to spread that knowledge," she said.
